home.title_html: MASTER THE ART OF CRAFTING AND FORGE YOUR ARSENAL
home.subtitle1: In the vast reaches of the Outer Ring Universe, a remarkable group of engineers and artisans has risen to the occasion.
home.subtitle2: Their mission? To share their know-how on crafting weapons and armor with the galaxy's most unwavering warriors.
home.subtitle3: With their guidance, players can now build the deadliest weaponry and the most exquisite armor to take on the galaxy's most formidable challenges.
home.readCarefuly: Follow this guide to learn more about the Crafting process.

home.rememberTip2: Once you make a choice, you can't go back, so be sure you're happy with your decisions before moving on to the next step!

video.text1: The Lands inside Outer Ring work as a free and open economy, accessible to all the community. You can either participate in the Public Auctions or buy directly from other landlords in the secondary market.
video.text2: Public Auctions will take place in four different sectors inside the three rings of Great Silver City, each divided into distinct districts. The buyout prices will increase in each round. Participate in the first rounds to get your land at a lower price.
video.text3: Explore the utilities of the Nano, Micro, Standard, Macro, and Mega Lands to exploit them as much as possible.

lootbox.title: Lootboxes
lootbox.subtitle: Unlock the treasures inside and fill your inventory with legendary gear. Each Lootbox contains up to 13 different ERC-721 and ERC-20 tokens. Generative weapons, armors and vehicles are some of the NFTs you will find inside.
lootbox.tier1: Get off to a good start. Go into battle prepared for victory. Don't waste time searching for materials and crafting equipment. A Tier 1 Lootbox is all you need to begin the quest. Opening one of them will give you access to raffles and a whitelist spot to own Micro Lands inside the Outer Ring. The story has already started, be part of it.
lootbox.tier2: Become a fearsome warrior acquiring the finest gear. A Tier 2 weapon is hidden inside this chest, ready to be wielded. Are you prepared to use its power? This Lootbox will allow you to train for battle in the Tech Demos and walk the lands you may own in the future. Be part of Outer Ring, and join the community's online events.
lootbox.tier3: Being a trooper sometimes isn't enough. Wear a Tier 2 armor and arm yourself with courage. Everyone knows how to shoot, but only a few remain standing after the battle. These NFTs will allow you to participate in raffles and whitelist spots for Standard Lands. Level up and access to Tech Demos and online events. Join the conquest, in-game and off-game.
lootbox.tier4: The conflict is getting serious. You will use the land vehicle to travel through Fanet's desserts, mountains and dungeons. And dominate them using Tier 2 weapons. Make history and read about it in ebook version of the novel that inspires our universe, a universe in the making... Our New Home.
lootbox.tier5: Fly above the rest, literally. Soar through space thanks to the spaceship you'll find in this Lootbox. Don't fear heights, opening a Tier 5 Lootbox you will rise among gods. The digital invades the material, the universe becomes metaverse, and our story becomes everyone's story. Be the protagonist, be brave. We are waiting for you.
lootbox.tierC: Do you want glory, fame and make your mark in the Outer ring? Create a clan. Lead it to victory. Believe in your allies, and fight with and for them. You don't make an army alone. With the Clan Badge, you will have it all. Hold history in your own hands and write it along with your people.
lootbox.tierM: Fortune favors the brave. Will the keys open a treasure? This Lootbox contains all kinds of game assets, the smallest rocks, and the deadliest weapons. Try your luck. When magic and fiction meet, the unexpected becomes possible.

cookies.c03: A cookie is a file that is downloaded to your computer when you access certain web pages. Cookies allow a web page, among other things, to store and retrieve information about the browsing habits of a user or their equipment and, depending on the information they contain and the way they use their equipment, they can be used to recognize to user.
cookies.c06: Are those that are sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain managed by the editor itself and from which the service requested by the user is provided.
cookies.c08: These are those that are sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain that is not managed by the publisher, but by another entity that processes the data obtained through the cookies.
cookies.c10: These are a type of cookies designed to collect and store data while the user accesses a web page.
cookies.c12: Are those that allow the user to navigate through a web page, platform or application and the use of different options or services that exist in it, such as controlling traffic and data communication, identifying the session, access restricted access parts, remember the elements that make up an order, perform the purchase process of an order, make the request for registration or participation in an event, use security elements during navigation, store contents for dissemination of videos or sound or share content through social networks.
cookies.c14: These are those that allow the person responsible for them to monitor and analyze the behaviour of the users of the websites to which they are linked. The information collected through this type of cookies is used in the measurement of the activity of the websites, application or platform and for the elaboration of navigation profiles of the users of said sites, applications and platforms, in order to introduce improvements in function of the analysis of the data of use made by the users of the service.
cookies.c15: What types of cookies does this website use?
cookies.c23: It is used to distinguish users.
cookies.c28: It is used to differentiate between the different tracking objects created in the session.
cookies.c34: It is used to distinguish users.
cookies.c39: It serves to protect the User from the site.
cookies.c42: How to manage cookies in the browser?
cookies.c43: The user expressly accepts, for the use of this Website, the treatment of the information collected in the manner and with the aforementioned purposes. And it also recognizes to know the possibility of rejecting the treatment of such data or information rejecting the use of Cookies by selecting the appropriate configuration for this purpose in your browser. Although this option to block cookies in your browser may not allow full use of all the functionality of the Website.
cookies.c44: You can allow, block or delete the cookies installed on your computer by configuring the browser options installed on your computer:

faqBaskonia.tip: Do you have doubts about the process?
faqBaskonia.title: How to buy and redeem an NFT MVP Signed Pack

whatIsMvpPack.title: What is an MVP Signed Pack?
whatIsMvpPack.answer: The NFT allows you to redeem unique collectibles (signed jersey, ball, and postcard) and enjoy virtual experiences in the Outer Ring.

bidOnMvpPack.title: How to participate in the auction of an MVP Signed Pack?
bidOnMvpPack.answer:
1. Connect your Metamask to the OR DAPP.
  2. Click on the "Marketplace" tab and look for the Partners section. There you will find the Baskonia Marketplace
  3. Inside, you will be able to see the product auctions that are currently active. Select the one you want to participate in and enter a higher bid than the last one.
  4. Once the auction is over, if you are the winner, you will be able to redeem your prize and the MVP Signed Pack will go to your inventory by clicking on the "WITHDRAW OBJECT" option.

redeemMvpPack.title: How to redeem an MVP Signed Pack?
redeemMvpPack.answer:
1. If you have an MVP Signed Pack (which has not been redeemed) in your wallet, you can choose to redeem the associated physical items (signed jersey, ball and postcard).
  2. To redeem the physical items click on "REDEEM NFT FOR REWARDS" and fill in the submission form.
  3. Follow the steps indicated in the pop-up window, and if the process is successful, you will receive a confirmation email within the next 24/48h.
  4. Once the properties of the digital collectible have been redeemed, they will be modified, so that you or the future holder will still have access to the "VIP Metaverse Baskonia".

q01.title: What is Outer Ring?
q01.answer: Outer Ring MMO is a free-to-play 3rd person sci-fi action RPG spanning an entire universe. Players will enter a unique metaverse and embark on an epic journey across galaxies to discover new worlds, unravel ancient mysteries, and face the dangers of deep space.

q02.title: Why does Outer Ring use blockchain technology?
q02.answer: Outer Ring uses blockchain to grant you ownership of your in-game assets, allowing them to participate in a Player Driven Economy and generate real value for your time exploring this universe.

q03.title: What type of tokens are used inside Outer Ring?
q03.answer: All in-game items, such as swords, guns, armor, vehicles, ships, or lands, can be converted into non-fungible tokens (NFTs). On the other hand, the resources needed to craft them as iron or copper... work as Fungible Tokens.

q04.title: What is the governance token of Outer Ring?
q04.answer: GQ (Galactic Quadrant) is the main token of Outer Ring. You can generate it by simply playing and then spend it in your daily activities inside the Outer Ring. Also, you can also use GQ to participate in the project's governance platform.

q05.title: Where can I find more information about the project?
q05.answer: You can keep exploring the Outer Ring by reading our whitepaper.

q01.title: What is a DAPP?
q01.answer: A Dapp (Decentralised Application) is a software application that runs on a decentralized network and is connected to a blockchain.

q02.title: What is the Outer Ring Dapp?
q02.answer: The Outer Ring Dapp (Decentralized Application) is a platform where you can manage all your tokenized items of the game thanks to blockchain technology.

q03.title: How can I use the Dapp?
q03.answer: You can use the Dapp to craft, buy, or sell in-game NFT items such as weapons, armor, or lands. Inside the Dapp you can also harvest materials or participate in the game's decision-making using the governance platform. All of this in a completely decentralized way.

q04.title: Is the Outer Ring Dapp safe?
q04.answer: Yes, all the smart contracts involved in the Dapp have been audited by companies such as Certik or Techrate. Check it out here.

q01.title: How do I connect to the Dapp?
q01.answer: To log in inside the Dapp you will need to connect your Metamask wallet or any other wallet compatible with WalletConnect.

q02.title: What is a wallet?
q02.answer: A wallet is a digital storage tool for your cryptocurrencies or other digital assets. Like a physical wallet, a digital wallet safely stores, receives and sends your Outer Ring digital items.

q03.title: How do I create a Metamask Wallet?
q03.answer:
1. Open your web browser and go to the Metamask page.
  2. Click on the "Get Chrome Extension" or "Get Firefox Extension" button depending on your browser. This will download and install the MetaMask extension in your browser.
  3. Once the extension is installed, you will see a MetaMask icon in the top right corner of your browser. Click on it to open the extension.
  4. Read and accept the terms of use and privacy policy on the welcome screen. Then click on "Create a new wallet".
  5. You will be asked to choose a strong password. Choose a password that is easy to remember but difficult for others to guess. Make sure you write it down in a safe place, and don't share it with anyone.
  6. Once you have chosen a password, MetaMask will display your 12-word recovery phrase. This phrase is unique to your wallet and is the way to recover it if you lose or forget it. Make sure you write it down in a safe place and do not share it with anyone. You alone are responsible for these 12 words; if you lose them, there will be no way to retrieve the wallet, losing all associated funds.
  7. Once you have entered the recovery phrase, click "Continue". MetaMask will ask you to confirm your recovery phrase by typing the words in the correct order. Once you have confirmed your recovery phrase, your wallet is ready to use.
  8. You can now use MetaMask to send and receive cryptocurrencies, interact with smart contracts, and much more. Remember to keep your password and passphrase in the correct order.

q04.title: How to set up the BSC network?
q04.answer:
1. Connect your wallet to the Outer Ring Dapp to switch networks.
  2. This will open Metamask asking you to switch to the Binance Smart Chain Mainnet.
  3. When you accept, the network will be switched automatically.

q05.title: How do I buy and send funds to my MetaMask?
q05.answer:
1. Choose a cryptocurrency exchange platform where you can buy BUSD or BNB. Popular options include Binance, Coinbase, and Kraken.
  2. Register with your chosen exchange platform and follow the instructions to verify your identity and link a form of payment, such as a credit card or bank account.
  3. Once you have verified your identity and linked a payment method, look for the option to buy BUSD. On some platforms, you can buy BUSD directly with your fiat currency (US dollars or euros); on others, you can buy another cryptocurrency, such as Bitcoin or Ethereum, and then exchange it for BUSD.
  4. Enter the amount of BUSD you wish to buy and confirm the transaction. Note that you will have to pay a transaction fee for the purchase.
  5. Once you have completed your purchase, look for the "Withdraw" or "Send" option on the exchange platform. Select this option and choose BUSD as the cryptocurrency you wish to send.
  6. Enter your MetaMask wallet address as the destination address for the shipment. You must also enter the amount of BUSD you wish to send and confirm the transaction. Please note that you will be charged a transaction fee for the shipment.
  7. Once you have confirmed the shipment, verify that the BUSD has been sent to your MetaMask wallet. To do this, click on the MetaMask icon in the top right corner of your browser and select your wallet. You will see your BUSD balance on the main screen of your wallet.

q06.title: Why does every transaction have a cost?
q06.answer: Every transaction requiring a write to the blockchain has a gas fee specified in the window where you accept the transaction.

q07.title: What happens if I receive a warning about a possible transaction failure?
q07.answer: If a warning message appears before you accept the transaction saying the transaction will fail, do not accept it, as it will not go through. Our contracts are audited, so the most common failures usually relate to a lack of funds or permissions.

q08.title: What happens if my transaction fails?
q08.answer: If the transaction fails, the purpose associated with the transaction will not be fulfilled. For example, if the transaction fails when trying to buy an NFT on our Marketplace, this NFT will still be for sale, and you will not have lost your money. However, please note that the cost of gas will have been irreversibly paid.

q09.title: Why do I have to give contract access to my tokens or NFTs?
q09.answer: For a contract to interact with your tokens or NFTs, you need to grant it permission. For example, if you want to offer an NFT for sale, the contract needs to have this permission to "access" your wallet.

q10.title: Is it safe to give a contract access to all my NFTs?
q10.answer: When requesting permission to access an NFT, we request permission to access all NFTs in a contract. This way, we avoid having to give permission every time a user wants to put a gun NFT for sale, for example.

q01.title: What is an NFT Lootbox?
q01.answer: A Lootbox contains a set of in-game items such as weapons, armor pieces, vehicles, or materials. There are 7 types of Lootboxes, each having different rewards. The NFTs inside them unlock utilities and experiences inside the Outer Ring ecosystem.

q02.title: What utilities can I unlock?
q02.answer: Some of the NFTs you will find inside the Lootboxes have associated utilities that will allow you, for example, to get discounts in the merchandising store, read the Outer Ring Saga novel, gain whitelist spots to other sales, or enter special discord groups. Click on the top of each Lootbox to find the specific details.

q03.title: What is the Early Explorer collection?
q03.answer: The NFTs extracted from the Lootboxes are marked as Early Explorer collection, being the first NFT collection ever released by Outer Ring.

q04.title: How can I buy a Lootbox?
q04.answer: You can purchase Lootboxes with BUSD or at half price with SCK tokens.

q05.title: What are SCKs?
q05.answer: SCK or Space Corsair Keys is a utility token that opens Lootboxes at half price. You can get them as a reward in the Staking Pools or buy them with other coins in a DEX like PancakeSwap.

q06.title: Why does the price change with every purchase?
q06.answer: To avoid the massive purchase of Lootboxes, the price increases by a small percentage with each purchase. This increase will gradually decrease until it returns to its original price.

q07.title: How do I know that the prizes in my Lootbox have been randomized?
q07.answer: The Lootboxes smart contract integrates Chainlink's oracles tools to verify its randomness in the blockchain. This way, you know every weapon you receive is a random reward.

q08.title: Where can I visualize my items?
q08.answer: Once you connect your wallet, you can click your profile and visualize all the NFTs, materials, and achievements you own. You can select any items to transfer, sell or auction from there.

q01.title: What is an NFT Marketplace?
q01.answer: A Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows the exchange of NFTs between individuals without the need to interact with an intermediary.

q02.title: What items can be traded in the Marketplace?
q02.answer: All the NFT in-game assets can be traded in the Marketplace: Weapons, armor, vehicles, lands...

q03.title: Can cryptocurrencies be used in the Marketplace?
q03.answer: The tokens enabled in our Marketplace are GQ, BUSD, and BNB.

q04.title: What fees are involved in each trade?
q04.answer: Each transaction contains a gas fee used to validate it in the blockchain, a 4% fee for Outer Ring development, and a 1% royalty fee to the first owner of an NFT.

q05.title: Can I transfer my NFTs to a friend from the Marketplace?
q05.answer: Yes, select the transfer option and send NFTs just paying the gas fee.

q01.title: How do I list an NFT for sale?
q01.answer: Entering your inventory and selecting the NFT you want to sell will take you to the detail page of this NFT. On this page, click the "put for sale" button, and in the pop-up window, select the price and currency you want to sell it.

q02.title: What happens if my NFT is not sold?
q02.answer: Your NFT will remain for sale until it is purchased or until you withdraw it.

q03.title: Can I withdraw my NFT at any time?
q03.answer: Yes. You can withdraw your NFT for sale at any time, at no cost other than the transaction fee.

q04.title: Can I change the price of my NFT for sale?
q04.answer: Yes. The price of an NFT you have for sale can be changed anytime.

q05.title: Why are there Partners in the Marketplace?
q05.answer: Outer Ring has multiple partners looking to join its universe and build this exciting project together. In the Marketplace, they can list special collections of NFTs with utilities in both ecosystems.

q06.title: I have a project, and I want to collaborate. How can I do it?
q06.answer: Fill in the form that you will find in the Partners section of the Marketplace.

q01.title: How do I put an NFT up for auction?
q01.answer: Going into your inventory and clicking on the NFT you want to sell will take you to the detail page of this NFT. On this page, click on the "put up for auction" button, and in the pop-up window, select the price and currency in which you want to sell it. In addition, the auction can be customized with two parameters: the duration (2, 4, or 6 days), which carries an extra cost indicated in the window, and the percentage increase over the previous bid.

q02.title: What auction times can be applied?
q02.answer: The auction can be set to three different durations: 2 days (default duration), 4 days (at the cost of 2.5$ in BNB), or 6 days (at the cost of 5$ in BNB).

q03.title: What happens if my NFT has no bids?
q03.answer: When the auction ends, if the NFT has not received any bids, you can withdraw it to return it to your wallet.

q04.title: Can I withdraw my NFT if I no longer want to auction it?
q04.answer: Once an NFT has been put up for auction it cannot be withdrawn until the auction's time ends.

q05.title: Can I change the price of my NFT at auction?
q05.answer: No. Once the NFT is put up for auction, the price will only change as bids are placed.

q06.title: Where is my NFT when the auction ends?
q06.answer: Once the NFT has been withdrawn from the auction, it will go into the wallet of the highest bidder (if there have been bids) or the seller (if there have been no bids).

q01.title: What is the Governance Platform in Outer Ring MMO?
q01.answer: The Governance Platform in Outer Ring MMO is a tool that allows you to participate in the decision-making of certain aspects of the videogame and blockchain ecosystem.

q02.title: Who creates proposals in the Governance Platform?
q02.answer: The Outer Ring Team creates its own proposals and evaluates those the community sends.

q03.title: How can I send a proposal?
q03.answer: In the "Leave your proposal" section, you have a form to add your proposal. To avoid mass mailing, each proposal sent will cost 200 VP.

q04.title: How do I vote on a proposal?
q04.answer: If the proposal is active, click on the option you want to vote for and add the amount of VP you want to vote with.

q05.title: How do I get Voting Power?
q05.answer: To gain Voting Power token (ORVP), you must stake GQ (Galactic Quadrant) on the platform. The amount of voting tokens you receive depends on the amount of GQ you deposit and the length of the blocking time you choose.

q06.title: What are the three types of staking pools available on the platform?
q06.answer: There are three types of staking pools available: "No blocking", "30-day blocking with an x2 rewards multiplier", and "90-day blocking with an x4 rewards multiplier".

q07.title: Can the VP token be transferred to another user?
q07.answer: No, the VP token is non-transferable.

q08.title: Can I vote several times on the same proposal?
q08.answer: You can spend Voting Power multiple times on the same proposal.

q09.title: Can I withdraw my vote on a proposal?
q09.answer: Once a vote has been cast, it cannot be withdrawn. If you change your mind, you can add more votes to one of the other options.

q10.title: What happens when a proposal ends?
q10.answer: The outcome of the vote will decide the future of the Outer Ring.

q01.title: What are the staking pools?
q01.answer: The staking pools are a platform where you can lock your tokens, such as GQ, to receive other tokens as a reward for participating in the Outer Ring ecosystem.

q02.title: How can I stake tokens?
q02.answer: To participate in the staking pools, you must connect your wallet. Once done, you must select a pool and deposit your tokens by approving the contract and transferring the desired amount.

q03.title: What tokens can I stake?
q03.answer: You can stake GQ, GQ LPs, and governance tokens from some members of the Galactic Alliance.

q04.title: Why should I earn materials?
q04.answer: Tokenized materials such as PLU or ACE are the main rewards in the staking pools. Stake your GQ to generate as much as you can and use them to craft NFT Weapons.

q05.title: What is the Galactic Alliance?
q05.answer: The Galactic Alliance is a partnership agreement that Outer Ring established with other projects to impulse blockchain adoption. In its first phase, we create cross-staking campaigns allowing users from one ecosystem to obtain tokens from the other.

q06.title: How can I withdraw my tokens from the staking?
q06.answer: You can withdraw your tokens at any time. However, some pools have locking periods, so redeeming or withdrawing them before they expire may involve paying a fee.

q07.title: What happens when a pool ends?
q07.answer: When a pool ends, the tokens and rewards remain in the smart contract until its owner claims them back.

q01.title: What tokens can I swap?
q01.answer: You can swap any of the tokenized materials: gasses and minerals.

q02.title: How do I swap two materials?
q02.answer: Select the materials you want to trade, introduce the amount you want to swap, approve the transaction and receive the resulting tokens in your wallet.

q03.title: How is the swap ratio determined?
q03.answer: The value is defined by supply and demand. The number of tokens inside the pool will define the pairs' exchange value.

q04.title: Is there a cost for swapping materials?
q04.answer: You must approve the contract and pay the transaction gas fee to swap materials. Also, from each transaction, a 0.3% fee is taken to provide liquidity into the Liquidity Pools.

q01.title: How do the Liquidity Pools work?
q01.answer: A Liquidity Pool is a collection of two different materials, locked together by the users to allow the decentralized exchange of these tokens. When you provide liquidity to a pool, you deposit an equal value of two different tokens into the pool.

q02.title: What is the benefit of providing liquidity into a Liquidity Pool?
q02.answer: By providing liquidity into a Liquidity Pool, you participate in the decentralized exchange of the two tokens, allowing others to trade them and receive rewards for your participation in the form of LP tokens.

q03.title: What is an LP token?
q03.answer: The LP token represents your percentage of participation in a Liquidity Pool, which you receive after providing liquidity into the pool.

q04.title: How do I use my LP tokens?
q04.answer: You can use LP tokens in the Farms to receive COP and IRON as rewards.

q05.title: Can I withdraw your tokens from the Liquidity Pool once you provide liquidity?
q05.answer: Yes, you can withdraw your tokens from the Liquidity Pool anytime.

q01.title: How do the Farms work?
q01.answer: In the Farms, you can stake your LP tokens to generate IRON  and COP materials as rewards. These materials are essential for NFT Crafting.

q02.title: How can I claim my rewards?
q02.answer: After depositing the LP token, you can claim your rewards or withdraw the LP at any time.

q01.title: What are the Lands?
q01.answer: Lands are a Non-Fungible Token (NFT) type that allows players to own and interact with virtual lands inside the Outer Ring universe. Each Land is unique and verified on the blockchain, meaning it is a one-of-a-kind item that can never be duplicated or destroyed.

q02.title: Where will the Lands be located?
q02.answer: The Lands are located in four different sectors inside the three rings of Great Silver City, each divided into distinct districts.

q03.title: How can I buy a Land?
q03.answer: You can  get a Land participating in the public auctions or buy it directly from other players or users in the marketplace.

q04.title: How will the public auctions work?
q04.answer: Outer Ring will hold a total of four public auctions. Two of them will be opened before the Lands are integrated into the game, while the last two will be made public afterward. If you want to own the Land in Outer ring, we encourage you to bid through one of these auctions.

q05.title: What types of Lands are available?
q05.answer: In Outer Ring there are the following types of Lands: Nano, Micro, Standard, Macro and Mega Lands, each with unique utilities both inside and outside the game.

q06.title: How can I enter the first public auction?
q06.answer: To participate in the first public auction of Micro, Standard, Macro and Mega Lands, you will need to be in possession of an NFT from the Early Explorer collection, available by opening Lootboxes or in the Marketplace. Nano Lands are open to everyone. In addition, you will need at least 1,000 GQ to make the initial bid.

q07.title: When can I start using my Lands?
q07.answer: You can use your Lands inside the Dapp to mine materials and improve your crafting before the Early Access Pre-Alpha. In-game Land utilities will arrive in future updates.

q08.title: What happens to the GQ used to purchase a Land?
q08.answer: All the GQ raised from the public auctions will be used to strengthen the game's economy, burning it and using it to provide liquidity and give rewards.

q09.title: Can I sell my Land to another player?
q09.answer: Yes, you can sell your Land to another player. You can do this by putting your Land up for auction or selling it directly to another player.

q10.title: Will the map change in the future?
q10.answer: Yes, the map and the city will evolve as the game progresses.

q01.title: Where is GoldStar Holdtel located?
q01.answer: The GoldStar Holdtel is located in one of the most central bubbles of Great Silver City, near the most exclusive Outer Ring partners buildings.

q02.title: How do you access the Holdtel?
q02.answer: You will need a NFT key assigned to one of the rooms in this building.

q03.title: How many NFT keys are going to be distributed?

q04.title: What requirements must I meet to get a NFT key?
q04.answer: You will only be eligible to receive an NFT key if you held at least 42,450 GQ in your wallet or in the stake and liquidity pools between 11:59 am on May 21st and 11:59 am on May 24th (CEST) of the year 2022.

q05.title: Why those dates?
q05.answer: These are the 72 hours following the announcement of the Outer Ring launch delay last year. This way, the project aims to reward its most loyal followers.

q06.title: Is there any other way to acquire a NFT Key?
q06.answer: You can buy or bid up for a Key if an owner decides to list his NFT on the Outer Ring Marketplace on our Dapp.

q07.title: Which wallet should I use to claim the NFT Key if elegible?
q07.answer: The one that you used to hold your GQ tokens during this period of time.

q08.title: How does Outer Ring know how many GQ I held back then?
q08.answer: The team has conducted an audited snapshot using the BACS system.

q09.title: How and when will the Outer Ring team distribute the keys?
q09.answer: On June 20th, a "Claim" option will be available in the Outer Ring Dapp.

q10.title: How do I claim my key?
q10.answer: If you are eligible, you will need to access the Outer Ring Dapp, connect your wallet, enter your user profile and click on the key-shaped icon in the upper-right corner.

q11.title: What types of room are available in the Holdtel?
q11.answer: There are 5 types of rooms: Junior Room, Standard Room, Executive Room, Deluxe Room and Royal Suite.

q12.title: What functionalities do they have?
q12.answer: All rooms have metaverse and in-game benefits.

q13.title: What specific advantages do they offer?
q13.answer: All rooms have a metaverse component: in all of them, it will be possible to invite any player and enjoy an exclusive space in the heart of Great Silver City. Additionally, all rooms have a spawn point functionality and direct access to the player's inventory. Furthermore, the room size determines the progressive capacity to decorate it with a certain number of cosmetics. Finally, holders of the highest-level room in the Holdtel can access exclusive information about the game and the partners of the Outer Ring universe.

q14.title: Can I invite other users to my room?
q14.answer: Yes, you can do so when the Holdtel is integrated into the game.

q15.title: Is there a limit to the cosmetics I can use to decorate my room?
q15.answer: Yes, the limit expands progressively as you upgrade your room category.

q16.title: Will the number of rooms be expanded in the future?
q16.answer: It is highly unlikely but it will depend on the development and evolution of the video game.

q17.title: When will it be operational in the game?
q17.answer: There is no specific date yet but the team is working hard to make it operational as soon as possible.

q18.title: Will more Holdtels be built in the future?
q18.answer: It will depend on the development and evolution of the game.

q19.title: Can I own more than one NFT key?

q20.title: Can I sell my keys?
q20.answer: Yes, you can either sell or auction your NFT keys on the Outer Ring Marketplace on the Dapp.

q21.title: Can I sell my room with cosmetics inside?
q21.answer: Yes, you can sell your room, including the cosmetics you have used to decorate it.

q22.title: Can I upgrade my room and obtain a higher category?
q22.answer: No, rooms and their types are predetermined and immovable concepts.

q23.title: Are the NFT keys transferable?
q23.answer: Yes, the NFT keys are fully transferable and can be sold or traded on the Outer Ring Dapp marketplace.

q01.title: What dates is the Early Access Pre-Alpha available?
q01.answer: During 3 gameplay windows: June 28th to July 11th, July 12th to July 25th, and July 26th onwards.

q02.title: What timeline?
q02.answer: Between June 28th and July 11th, the game will be open from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. (CEST); between July 12th and July 27th, it will be open from 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. (CEST), and starting from July 26th, it will be open 24/7. Only during the first two gameplay windows, the game will not be available on weekends.

q03.title: Is the game operational on weekends?
q03.answer: During the first two gameplay windows, the game will not be operational, but it will be available after the third window, starting from July 26th.

q04.title: What requirements must I meet to play?
q04.answer:
You must have a wallet and meet one of the following two requirements:

  1. Possess at least one Outer Ring NFT obtained through Lootboxes or in the in-game Marketplace.
  2. If you do not have an NFT, you must possess at least 100,000 Galactic Quadrant tokens in your wallet or in the project's liquidity pools or stake.

If you meet these requirements, you will be included in a whitelist that identifies you as an eligible player.

q05.title: What are the technical requirements to play?
q05.answer:
The minimum requirements are:

  • CPU 4 Core / 4 threads
  • RAM 8 GB
  • HDD 5 GB
  • OS Windows 10 (64 bit required)
  • Video card: 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • NET Broadband Internet connection
  • Component C++
  • DirectX

The recommended requirements:

  • CPU 8 Core / 16 threads
  • RAM 16 GB
  • HDD 5 GB
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Minimum Windows version 21H2
  • Video card: 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • NET Broadband Internet connection
  • Component C++
  • DirectX

q06.title: How frequently is the whitelist updated?
q06.answer: The first whitelist will close on Monday, June 26th, at 23:59 h (CEST). After that, the whitelist will be updated on a weekly basis.

q07.title: When do the whitelists close?
q07.answer: Every week, starting from June 26th, at 23:59 h (CEST).

q08.title: How can I acquire GQ?
q08.answer: You can get GQ on any of the following centralized exchanges (Gate, Huobi, Mexc, Bitbase, Tokpie, Bitmart) or decentralized exchanges (Pancakeswap, Biswap, Apeswap, Babyswap).

q09.title: How can I acquire an NFT of Outer Ring?
q09.answer: You can acquire an NFT of Outer Ring in the game's Dapp Marketplace or by purchasing a Lootbox.

q10.title: Can I access with a species NFT or with materials?
q10.answer: All Outer Ring NFTs will be valid for access, except for materials and species NFTs.

q11.title: Can I access with a Land NFT?

q12.title: Can I access with a GoldStar Holdtel NFT Key?

q13.title: How is the game download process?
q13.answer: Users who wish to play must visit the Blink Galaxy platform, register, and then download the Outer Ring executable file.

q14.title: How is the game access process?
q14.answer: After downloading the executable, the user needs to fill in the mandatory fields on a login screen and then access the game if they meet the requirements mentioned earlier.

q15.title: What is Blink Galaxy?
q15.answer:
It is the digital distribution platform created by Nexxyo Labs, which aims to gather the video games developed by Maniac Panda Games, as well as other in-house and third-party projects.

Blink Galaxy will act as a link between the video games and web3 technology, if necessary.

q16.title: When will Blink Galaxy be released?
q16.answer: Before the Pre-Alpha launch, scheduled between June 26th and 27th, 2023.

q17.title: Will I be able to modify the username I register in Blink Galaxy in the future?
q17.answer: It will not be possible to modify the username.

q18.title: Will I be able to modify my alias in Outer Ring in the future?
q18.answer: Yes, you will be able to modify your alias.

q19.title: What gaming experience does the Pre-Alpha offer?
q19.answer: The three pillars of the Pre-Alpha are exploration, combat, and interaction with the videogame's metaverse.

q20.title: What purpose does GQ serve in the Pre-Alpha?
q20.answer: Starting from the second launch window on July 12th, you will be able to use GQ in thrilling PvE battles. It will not be possible to use or obtain the token in any other way.

q22.title: How many players can I engage in PvP battles with?
q22.answer: It will depend on the scenario in which you play, there would be between 6 and 30 players.

q23.title: Can I team up in PvE battles?
q23.answer: You can fight alongside other players in these battles, but you won't be able to team up with them.

q24.title: How many weapons can I use?
q24.answer: A total of 2 weapons: the assault rifle and the pistol.

q25.title: How many players can access the Early Access Pre-Alpha?
q25.answer: As many as are included in the whitelist. This means as many as meet the entry requirements.

q26.title: Will the Lands be available?
q26.answer: No, Lands will not be available in the Outer Ring Pre-Alpha.

q29.title: Can I play with all the species in the videogame?
q29.answer: Yes, you will be able to choose from all the playable species in the videogame.

q31.title: Can I make purchases with GQ in Great Silver City?
q31.answer: You won't be able to use GQ to make purchases, but you will be able to interact with the websites of your partners and make purchases in a traditional way.

q32.title: Can I interact with Outer Ring partners in Great Silver City?
q32.answer: Yes, you can interact with all the partners that already have infrastructure built in Great Silver City.

q33.title: Can I make use of the SCK token in the Pre-Alpha?
q33.answer: You will not be able to use SCK in the Pre-Alpha; the only token in use in this preliminary version will be GQ, in arena battles starting from the second game window.

q34.title: What will happen in the future with the in-game progress I make in the pre-alpha?
q34.answer: You will be able to store and retrieve the GQ (in-game currency) you obtain in the Pre-Alpha. You will also retain your user and alias generated in Blink Galaxy and Outer Ring.

q35.title: Is there a date for the Beta version of the video game?
q35.answer: The team will provide details about the future of the video game in the coming months.

q01.title: What is the Outer Ring Crafting System and what can I create?
q01.answer: The Outer Ring Crafting is a process through which you can create NFTs of weapons or armor by spending materials.

q02.title: What do I need to start crafting?
q02.answer: To use crafting, it will be necessary to have all the necessary materials and a certain amount of the GQ token to pay for the costs of all processes involved. In addition, you will need BNB in your wallet to pay for the gas of the transactions.

q03.title: Materials: what are they?
q03.answer: The materials are tokenized resources from the Outer Ring universe.</br></br>There are 16: Iron, Copper, Oxygen, Hydrogen, Carbon, Nickel, Silicon, Chromium, Helium, Vanadium, Methane, Aluminium, Cobalt, Plutonium, Acetylene, and Argon.

q04.title: How do I get these materials?
q04.answer: The materials, which could be obtained through Lootboxes until July 25, 2023, can now be acquired through material Farms in the Outer Ring Dapp or by staking GQ in certain pools.</br></br>Additionally, they can also be obtained by staking NFTs of Lands in the new material extraction pools.</br></br>On the other hand, if you have materials, you can exchange them through the swap option in the DeFi section of the DApp.

q05.title: What are the steps to craft?
q05.answer: Crafting consists of three steps: creation, styling and assembly.

q06.title: How long does it take to complete the whole crafting process?
q06.answer: The creation process can take between 12-36 hours, depending on the characteristics of the NFT being created and the optional use of process boosting.

q07.title: Can these processes be accelerated?
q07.answer: Yes, each process can be accelerated through its corresponding GQ transaction.

q08.title: Can I change the choices made in previous steps?
q08.answer: The choices made in any of the previous steps will not be modifiable in the following ones.

q09.title: Do I need to own all the materials before starting the Crafting process?
q09.answer: It is not necessary. To start each of the three steps of Crafting, you only need to own the materials necessary to begin that specific step. However, as you progress crafting your item, additional materials may be required.

q10.title: How many materials will each level cost me, and how many GQs?
q10.answer: The cost depends on the type of object and the quality of the item you want to manufacture. You will be able to view the costs before starting the process.

q11.title: What can I do with the NFTs I create through the Crafting process?
q11.answer: The manufactured NFTs can be listed for sale or auction in the Outer Ring Marketplace.

q12.title: What will happen to the NFTs I have achieved so far?
q12.answer: Its properties and its use will be identical to the NFTs created in crafting.

q13.title: When will I be able to play with the NFTs obtained inside the Crafting System?
q13.answer: A specific date has not yet been determined.

q01.title: What is the Creation step about?
q01.answer: In the creation step, the selected crafter will create the base of the weapon or armor you select. Here, you will also choose whether a weapon will be laser type or not.

q02.title: What sort of weapons are available to craft?
q02.answer: There are a total of 13 weapons: Blade, Blunt, Knife, Pistol, Revolver, Shotgun, Repeater-Shotgun, Assault SMG, High-Rate SMG, Assault Rifle, Light Machine Gun, Sniper Rifle, and Precision Rifle.

q03.title: What sort of armor are available to craft?
q03.answer: There are a total of 9 armor types: Helmet, Chest, Shoulders, Forearms, Arms, Gloves, Leggs, Kneepads, and Boots.

q04.title: What crafters are there, and what is the difference between them?
q04.answer: There are a total of 3 crafters, each of them representing a pool where the process begins, and each corresponds to a different tier.

q05.title: What is the cost of the creation process?
q05.answer: Each crafter will receive a "salary". The higher the crafter's experience, the better the outcome, and this level increase will be reflected in the price.

q06.title: How many weapons and armors can I create?
q06.answer: You can create as many weapons and armors as the materials you can afford to spend. However, you can only have three items at a time in the creation process, one of each tier.

q07.title: How do I start the Creation process?
q07.answer: To initiate the process, first select the weapon or armor you want to create. If you choose a weapon, decide whether it will be laser-type or not. Next, ensure you have the materials to begin the process. Finally, click on the "start creation" button and confirm the transaction in your wallet.

q08.title: How long does the creation process take?
q08.answer: The creation process can last between 4-12 hours, depending on the characteristics of the NFT being created.

q09.title: How do I finish the creation process?
q09.answer: Once the waiting time is completed, send your creation to the Design pool to customize its style.

q10.title: What happens if I receive an error message during the completion of the process?
q10.answer: Make sure you have a Design pool available, which enables the second step of the Crafting process. If not, the crafters won't be able to submit their creation, and the process cannot proceed.

q01.title: What is the Styling step about?
q01.answer: In the Styling step, you can choose the aesthetics of the armor or, in the case of weapons, of each of its components.

q02.title: How many components make up a weapon?
q02.answer: Each weapon follows the following composition pattern: they are all composed of basic parts (which are mandatory), to which you can add three optional parts (sights, silencers, and under-barrel accessories).

q03.title: How do I start the Design process?
q03.answer: To initiate the process, first select the style of the weapon or armor parts you are creating; you can add optional parts for an additional cost.</br></br>Next, ensure you have the necessary materials to begin the second step.</br></br>Finally, click the "start design" button and accept the transaction in your wallet.

q04.title: How long does the design process take?
q04.answer: The design process can last between 4-12 hours, depending on the characteristics of the NFT being created.

q05.title: How do I finish the design process?
q05.answer: Once the waiting time has concluded, you will need to click on the Design pool card button to send the NFT to the next creation step: the Assembly pool.

q06.title: What happens if I receive an error message during the completion of the process?
q06.answer: Make sure you have an Assembly pool available, which enables the third step of the Crafting process. If not, the process cannot proceed.

q07.title: How many weapons and armors can I have in the Design process?
q07.answer: You can have a maximum of up to three items at a time in the design process, one for each available pool.

q01.title: What is the Assembly step about?
q01.answer: In the assembly step, you will select the engineer who will be responsible for assembling all parts.

q02.title: What is the difference between engineers?
q02.answer: There are a total of 5 engineers, and each of them can assemble your weapon, ensuring you certain percentages of the final NFT rarity. Better engineers provide a higher probability of obtaining better rarity.

q03.title: What is the cost of each engineer?
q03.answer:
Each engineer will have a "fee" that they will charge for their services based on the level of the item. The payment will be in GQ, equivalent to the following amounts in USD:

q04.title: How do I start the Assembly process?
q04.answer: To initiate the process, first select the engineer you want to assemble your weapon. Next, ensure you have the materials to begin the step. Finally, click the "Start Assembly" button and accept the transaction in your wallet.

q05.title: How long does the assembly process take?
q05.answer: The assembly process can last between 4-12 hours, depending on the characteristics of the NFT being created.

q06.title: How do I finish the Assembly process?
q06.answer: Once the waiting time is completed, you will need to click on the engineer's card button, which will send the NFT to your wallet.

q07.title: How many weapons and armors can I build during the Assembly process?
q07.answer: You can have a maximum of three items at a time in the assembly process.

q01.title: What does material extraction entail?
q01.answer: The extraction process involves using a team of miners who will be responsible for collecting resources once you stake the NFT Lands in Outer Ring.

q02.title: How many extraction pools are there?
q02.answer: There are 5 pools in which to deposit the NFT Lands of Outer Ring, one pool for each size.

q03.title: How many lands can I have in staking?
q03.answer: The pools only accept a single land, so in total, you can have 5 lands, one of each size.

q04.title: What is the cost of depositing a land in the pool?
q04.answer:
The cost depends on the type of land you deposit. The payment is made in GQ, with the amount equivalent to the following quantities in USD:
  • Nano Land: 1$
  • Micro Land: 5$
  • Standard Land: 10$
  • Macro Land: 15$
  • Mega Land: 30$

q05.title: What material rewards can I obtain through the pools?
q05.answer: The pools provide different rewards based on the size of the Land in question: Nano and Micro Lands pools provide Tier 1 materials; Standard and Macro Lands pools offer Tier 2 materials, while the Mega Lands pool provides Tier 3 materials.

q06.title: What benefits are there for crafting by having a land deposited?
q06.answer:
If you have a micro or larger land deposited, you will receive discounts on material costs and reduced crafting waiting times:
  • Nano: No discounts or reductions are given.
  • Micro: 10% in material costs and 0 in time.
  • Standard: 20% in material costs and 10% in time.
  • Macro: 30% in material costs and 20% in time.
  • Mega: 40% in material costs and 30% in time.

q07.title: How are these benefits applied in crafting?
q07.answer: If you have a land deposited in any of the pools, the discounts will be applied automatically. If you have multiple lands deposited, the discount from the largest land will always be applied.

q08.title: Can the discounts for having multiple lands in the pools be accumulated?
q08.answer: No, only the discount from the largest deposited land will be applied, meaning the highest discount.

q09.title: What happens if I use these benefits in crafting?
q09.answer: If you benefit from having a land in the pools during any of the crafting processes, this land will be locked in the pool during the same time that the process lasts.

q10.title: How do I add a Land to a pool?
q10.answer: Access the material extraction section of the DApp. Click the button to add a Land and select the one you want to add. Finally, after confirming the transaction in your wallet, the Land will have been added to the pool.

q11.title: How do I collect the generated resources?
q11.answer: Over time, the pools will generate resources. To collect them, simply press the 'collect resources' button at the bottom.

q12.title: How do I remove a Land if I no longer want to continue generating resources?
q12.answer: If you want to stop extracting materials from a land, press the "end extraction" button.
